long_description: The classic Neve Drew Zip-Neck sweater embodies masculine sophistication and fine tailoring, yet it's sporty enough for a day of Nordic skiing or merely strolling across town. Soft blend of ultrafine merino wool, polyester and nylon insulates well on chilly winter days. Neve Drew Zip-Neck sweater has a classic fit. Hand wash cold; lay flat to dry.
short_description: The classic Neve Drew Zip-Neck sweater embodies masculine sophistication and fine tailoring, yet it's sporty enough for a day of Nordic skiing or merely strolling across town.
